Header: No completion from the opposition; Sarath Ekanayaka
Content: Several political party representatives held public rallies and processions after handing over nominations yesterday for the North, North Western and Central Province election. During a rally held in Kandy former Central Province Chief MinisterÂ  Sarath Ekanayake said that his group had no competition from the Opposition. Meanwhile at a meeting held in Kurunegala UPFA candidate Dayasiri Jayasekera too expressed his views about the election this time. At a rally held in the Kurunegala town yesterday, Minister Johnston Fernando stated as follows with regard to the contentious situation observed in the election propaganda.
